interpretive_traits.essence: Veils the final coronation of spirit; in his presence the invisible becomes sovereign.
interpretive_traits.themes: Transcendence, humility of greatness, revelation of the hidden.
interpretive_traits.wisdom: The greatest crown is never seen upon the head.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Offer twilight lotus, mirror-finished coin, serpent crown symbol; avoid empty accolades.
interpretive_traits.challenge: Fuse 3 Aura NFTs; contract checks RGB sum equals 0xFFFFFF; success mints Crown Nulla.
interpretive_traits.boon: Crown grants invisibility for 10 blocks but drains 5 % HP per block while unseen.
interpretive_traits.verse: Only the unseen light crowns the truest king.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Lord of the hidden coronation, attended by 1 111 unseen heralds.
